entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little while back and it's just not working out for me. Can I get a refund?
Okay, I can certainly look into that for you. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase, please?
It's… uh… [email protected] Hurry up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. Okay, I see the order here. It includes a VeloBand Pulse, purchased on October 26th. Today is November 10th. I understand you'd like to return it. Let me check our return policy for you.
According to our policy, the return window for electronics, including the VeloBand Pulse, is 10 days from the date of purchase. Unfortunately, it appears your purchase falls outside that window.
What?! Are you serious? Only 10 days? That's ridiculous! I barely had time to try it out! This is completely unfair. I want my money back. I use VeloFit all the time.

I understand your frustration. While a full refund isn't possible due to the return window, I can explore some options. While a policy exception for a full refund isn't feasible, I can offer you store credit for the current value of the VeloBand Pulse. This credit can be used on any other VeloFit product.
Store credit? Ugh, I guess that's better than nothing. But I really needed the cash. I specifically bought the VeloBand Pulse because my friend recommended it, but I'm just not vibing with it.

I understand. I'm truly sorry the VeloBand Pulse didn't meet your expectations. With the store credit, you could perhaps explore our range of VeloFit apparel or accessories. The credit will be for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse and has no expiration date.
Okay, fine. How do I get this store credit thing?

I've just applied the store credit to your account, [email protected] You'll receive an email confirmation shortly with the details and instructions on how to redeem it during your next purchase. You can use it online or in any VeloFit store.
Alright, I see it. Thanks. I appreciate you trying to help. I'm still a bit bummed about the short return window, but at least I can use it for something else.
You're very welcome! We value your business. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's all. Thanks again.
Have a great day with VeloFit!
